remarks: Lemma for ~ pmltpc .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jul-2014.)
statement:
pmltpclem1.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. S ) $.
pmltpclem1.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. S ) $.
pmltpclem1.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. S ) $.
pmltpclem1.4 $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
pmltpclem1.5 $e |- ( ph -> B < C ) $.
pmltpclem1.6 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( ( F ` A ) < ( F ` B ) /\ ( F ` C ) < ( F ` B ) ) \/ ( ( F ` B ) < ( F ` A ) /\ ( F ` B ) < ( F ` C ) ) ) ) $.
pmltpclem1 $p |- ( ph -> E. a e. S E. b e. S E. c e. S ( a < b /\ b < c /\ ( ( ( F ` a ) < ( F ` b ) /\ ( F ` c ) < ( F ` b ) ) \/ ( ( F ` b ) < ( F ` a ) /\ ( F ` b ) < ( F ` c ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A a b c $.
$d B b c $.
$d C c $.
$d F a b c $.
$d S a b c $.
